name: Nova Halo Diamond Engagement Ring
description: Mesmerizing ribbons of metal and pavé diamonds twist around the band and center gem of this unique halo ring.

name: H&M Global Desi
description: Blue solid woven regular top, curved hem with tassell detailing has shoulder straps, and sleeveless

name: Camellia Diamond Engagement Ring
description: A milgrain filament winds upwards towards round and pear shaped diamonds that rest at either side of the center stone for a subtly floral look, while a trellis-style head adds a bit of whimsy (1/10 total carat weight).

name: Hermes  Carlton London
description: Off-White self-striped knitted midi A-line dress, has a scoop neck, sleeveless, straight hem

name: Tapered Baguette Three Stone Diamond Engagement Ring
description: Captivating tapered baguette diamonds are bar-set in this elegant ring, brilliantly framing the center gem. With a delicate band, this ring evokes classic beauty (1/5 total carat weight).

name: East West Tapered Baguette Diamond Engagement Ring
description: This modern ring takes a classic silhouette and elevates it with the addition of east west set tapered baguette diamonds that shine brightly, making this style the perfect choice for anyone looking for a three stone ring with a twist (1/5 total carat weight).

name: Jaqueline Art Deco Diamond Engagement Ring
description: This Art Deco-inspired three stone ring perfectly blends modern and vintage styles with two round diamonds in unique sunburst shapes that rest alongside the glittering center stone (1/8 total carat weight).

name: Anita Art Deco Ring
description: Motifs reminiscent of Art Deco architecture wrap half of the way around this design-forward ring for a look that is all at once sophisticated and trendy.

name: Flair Diamond Ring (1/6 ct. tw.)
description: Flair Diamond Ring (1/6 ct. tw.)

name: Flair Diamond Ring (1/6 ct. tw.)
description: Shimmering scalloped pavé diamonds flow halfway down this band, creating a subtly curved chevron shape. This stylish ring is perfect on its own or paired with an engagement ring.

name: Laurel Diamond Ring
description: Hand-engraved fern details crafted in lustrous precious metal and prong-set diamonds create a sophisticated, delicate look in this nature-inspired ring (1/8 total carat weight).

name: Belvoir Art Deco Diamond Ring
description: Tapered baguette diamonds fan across the top half of this unique ring, creating a look reminiscent of the Art Deco era with an edgy, modern twist (7/8 total carat weight).

name: Scuba Stand Collar Topper Jacket
description: Zara provides only the highest-quality selection of dresses, womens suits, and suited separates.

name: Armani Wide-Leg Trousers
description: Monochrome elegance. Made with a relaxed wide-leg, these trousers are made from a sustainable soft organic cotton with a mechanical stretch making the garment easily recycled.

name: Short Sleeve Shirts For Men
description: From casual days out to parties, dinners and other events that call for a dressier look, a short sleeve shirt is a versatile piece that works for all kinds of occasions.

name: Blazer And A Neck Scarf
description: blue short sleeve basic midi dress featuring a crew neckline in a jersey fabric.

name: Zara Solly White Shirt
description: For a chic and smart look, don this white shirt from Solly by Allen Solly. Crafted from a cotton-nylon blend with a hint of stretch, this design features a dotted pattern. Wear this 3/4th sleeves shirt with trousers and wedges to a client meeting.
